name: Intellacall – Instant One Click Live Video Calls
author: Intellacall

sections.description:
Put your team in a face to face online interaction with the customer instantly from your existing webpage.

No Downloads-No Passwords-No Meeting ID’s.

Brick and Mortar

Bring your brick and mortar business into the future of online interactions.

Online Business

Supercharge your online business with cutting edge video interaction technology.

Presentations

Present instant live product demos from the convenience of your office and the customers home.

Answer your calls on our web application on your browser, iOS application or Android application.

Expert Support

We have a global team of engineers ready to help you. To ask your questions contact us directly.

Paid Services

Click here to learn more and create your account.

Official Website

You can find more information on our web site (intellacall.com)
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin
  4. (Make your instructions match the desired user flow for activating and installing your plugin. Include any steps that might be needed for explanatory purposes)
